body_html:
Bazel should not download the unused stuff in your workspace anyway, so I do not see a big upside compared to the much longer workspace file.
You said you are trying to use a different version of one of the TF dependencies? Is that your motivation?

body:
Bazel should not download the unused stuff in your workspace anyway, so I do not see a big upside compared to the much longer workspace file.
You said you are trying to use a different version of one of the TF dependencies? Is that your motivation?
